text: yeeonjayeo sillo hananim-i geu daeege heoyonghayeossnani geudaega i mi jichamgeum-eul jibulhan bu-indeul hana nimkkeseo jeonjaeng-ui pololosseo geudaeegebuyeohan jadeullo geudaeui oleunson-i soyuhago issneun ideulgwa samchon-ui ttal deulgwa gomoui ttaldeulgwa oesamchon-ui ttal deulgwa ijuhayeoon oesugmoui ttaldeul gwa yeeonja-ege seuseuloleul uitaghagoja haneun mid-eum-eul gajin yeoseongdeulgwa yeeonjaga gyeolheunhagoja wonhal gyeong-u geudaeegeneun heoyongdoena daleun midneun salamdeul-egeneun heoyongdoeji aniham-ila hananim-eun geudeul-ui bu-indeulgwa geudeul oleunson-i soyuhago issneun geosdeul-e gwanhayeo midneun jaideul-ege uimuhwa hangeos do algo issnola ineun geudaeege eo lyeoum-i eobsdolog ham-ini sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
